subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire splashed his name across the Knicks’ record books Friday night, imprinting his name on at least two pages while another crowd cheered his every move.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire splashed his name across the Knicks’ record books Friday night, imprinting his name on at least two pages while another crowd cheered his every move.
